headline: Builders FirstSource Releases 2025 Corporate Social Responsibility Report
summary: IRVING, Texas, April 30, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) ("Builders FirstSource" or the "Company"), the nation’s largest supplier of building products, prefabricated components, and value-added services to the professional market for new residential construction and repair and remodeling, announced today that it has published its 2025 Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) report, highlighting how the Company aligns and advances sustainability within its business strategy to deliver

content.title: Builders FirstSource Releases 2025 Corporate Social Responsibility Report
content.summary: IRVING, Texas, April 30, 2025--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) ("Builders FirstSource" or the "Company"), the nation’s largest supplier of building products, prefabricated components, and value-added services to the professional market for new residential construction and repair and remodeling, announced today that it has published its 2025 Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) report, highlighting how the Company aligns and advances sustainability within its business strategy to deliver
